mapper.insert: insert into memo (memo_title, memo_contents, memo_color) values (#{memoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memoContents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memoColor,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT memo.memo_no AS memo_no, memo.memo_title AS memo_title, memo.memo_contents AS memo_contents, memo.memo_reg_date AS memo_reg_date, memo.memo_del_date AS memo_del_date, memo.attached_trip_plan_no AS attached_trip_plan_no, memo.attached_review_no AS attached_review_no, memo.attached_chat_room_no AS attached_chat_room_no, memo.memo_color AS memo_color, memo_access.memo_access_user AS memo_author FROM memo LEFT JOIN memo_access ON memo.memo_no = memo_access.memo_no WHERE memo.memo_no = memo_access.memo_no AND memo_access.is_memo_author = 1 AND memo.memo_no = #{memoNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE memo SET memo_title = #{memoTitle}, memo_contents = #{memoContents}, memo_reg_date = NOW(), memo_del_date = #{memoDelDate}, memo_color = #{memoColor} WHERE memo_no = #{memoNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE memo SET memo_del_date = CURRENT_DATE, attached_trip_plan_no = null, attached_review_no = null, attached_chat_room_no = null WHERE memo_no = #{memoNo}
mapper.select: SELECT memo.memo_no,memo.memo_title,memo.memo_contents,memo.memo_reg_date,memo.memo_del_date,memo.memo_color ,access.memo_access_user AS memo_author ,trip_plan.trip_plan_no,trip_plan.trip_plan_author,trip_plan.trip_plan_title,trip_plan.trip_plan_thumbnail,trip_plan.trip_plan_reg_date,trip_plan.is_plan_public ,review.review_no,review.review_title,review.review_thumbnail,review.review_reg_date,review.review_author,review.is_review_public ,chat_rooms.chat_room_no,chat_rooms.chat_room_title,chat_rooms.travel_start_date,chat_rooms.current_persons,chat_rooms.max_persons FROM memo_access AS access LEFT JOIN memo ON access.memo_no = memo.memo_no LEFT JOIN trip_plan ON memo.attached_trip_plan_no = trip_plan.trip_plan_no LEFT JOIN review ON memo.attached_review_no = review.review_no LEFT JOIN chat_rooms ON memo.attached_chat_room_no = chat_rooms.chat_room_no WHERE access.memo_access_user = #{searchKeyword} AND access.is_memo_author = 1 ORDER BY memo.memo_no DESC LIMIT #{mysqlStartRowNum}, #{pageSize}
